The times between $ 7$ and $ 8$ o'clock, correct to the nearest minute, when the hands of a clock will form an angle of $ 84$ degrees are:\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ \text{7: 23 and 7: 53} \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ \text{7: 20 and 7: 50} \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ \text{7: 22 and 7: 53} \\
\textbf{(D)}\ \text{7: 23 and 7: 52} \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ \text{7: 21 and 7: 49}$
